decision_conditions: The amendments to Block A, including the lift/ smoke shaft overruns and the installation of balcony supports, do not encompass high-quality architecture and do not deliver a good design as required by the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), and Policy DAA of the Ealing Local Plan 2022 (Reg 19).
description: Retrospective minor material amendment (S.73) to vary conditions Condition 2 (Approved Plans), Condition 3 (Proposed materials), Condition 6 (Former Lifetime Homes standards), Condition 7 (Former affordable wheelchair housing), Condition 8 (Building envelope sound insulation), Condition 9 (External noise from machinery etc), Condition 11 (Separation of noise sensitive rooms), Condition 12 (Separation of communal facilities from dwellings), Condition 13 (Demolition MS), Condition 14 (ICNIRP Certification), Condition 15 (Contaminated Land (site investigation)), Condition 16 (Contaminated Land (remediation scheme)), Condition 18(b) (LZC energy equipment spec), Condition 19 (Overheating and cooling), Condition 21 (Sustainable design and construction), Condition 22 (Drainage design), Condition 24 (Construction environmental plan), Condition 25 (Piling method statement), Condition 29 (Construction management plan), Condition 34 (Protection of hedges and trees), Condition 35 (Tree monitoring plan), seeking to allow site adjustments to access road kerblines, parking and soft landscaping to allow for refuse/fire lorry turning, elevational changes (including window positions, materials, balcony structure), layout changes (including arrangement of the flats, corridors, lobbies and circulation shaft), adjustment to unit accommodation and bed spaces as well as unit areas, re-allocation of the M4(3) compliant units to the ground floor of Block A (flats); and redefinition of some M4(2) units to M4(1) in order to comply with Building Regulations, addition of smoke vent 'shafts' and lift overrun to roof level in order to comply with Building Regulations, alterations to gated access to canal, in pursuant to planning permission reference 185960FUL dated 02/09/2020 for 'Construction of a part four, part five, part six and part seven storey.....'
